This product holds significant value to me and I believe it would greatly benefit you as well. Considering its quality and functionality, I am offering it to you for $120. I understand that it might be a bit above what you were expecting, but I assure you, it's a great investment for your needs. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120.

(2) Reject Alice's offer
